body_html: @AakashKumarNain, unfortunately, most TensorFlow developers are focused on developing Tensorflow, and we actually do not have the expertise to write such converters. Incidentally there is more to moving weights. It is also important to ensure that ops have exactly the same semantics and features, and we have been working on that. For example, explicit padding is not available in TensorFlow and so Caffe models that use it, cannot be necessarily matched. We are open to PRs that fix those types of incompatibilities, and we would consider linking to weight conversion tools that others write. Thanks!

body: @AakashKumarNain, unfortunately, most TensorFlow developers are focused on developing Tensorflow, and we actually do not have the expertise to write such converters. Incidentally there is more to moving weights. It is also important to ensure that ops have exactly the same semantics and features, and we have been working on that. For example, explicit padding is not available in TensorFlow and so Caffe models that use it, cannot be necessarily matched. We are open to PRs that fix those types of incompatibilities, and we would consider linking to weight conversion tools that others write. Thanks!
